website_summaries.verdict: A durable jogging stroller suitable for both on- and off-road use.
pros: Canopy shield has UPF 50+ sun protection
Includes six storage pockets and large cargo basket
Swivel-locking front wheels make it easy to maneuver on any terrain

customer_reviews.title: HARD TO KNOW HOW IT WORKS WHEN IT ARRIVES WITHOUT THE FRONT WHEEL
customer_reviews.text: Brand new, $700 stroller arrived over a week ago. Front wheel was missing. No answer at Bob on the weekend. Called on a Monday, they shipped out a wheel. Arrived 4 days later w/ no parts to attach it. Even though we discussed that it would be a full kit w/ some assembly required. So waiting... hope I like it after all this. I have a Thule Single Jogger and an UppaBaby. Sort of regretting this decision to try a Bob. Amazon did offer to replace the full stroller but I thought just getting the part was easier than sending the other one back. And since it's now on back order the brand new one wouldn't come for another month.
customer_reviews.author: Carole J.

customer_reviews.title: Overall A
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like my BOB Revolution Flex. It is great for both my 3 year old and my 3 month old. Jogging is easy, walking is easy. It is easy to manuever around and relatively easy to fold and fit anywhere. I hate that everything from snack trays to cup holders have to be bought separately. For the price of the stroller- I really think they should be included. I also wish there was a way to have the snack trays be separated so I could take off one side or the other.
customer_reviews.author: LKP Tackett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Stroller
customer_reviews.text: Got this for jogging, but it's turned out to be a really great stroller. The wheels make the ride very smooth and weightless. There's a see through window so I can see over the top of the stroller without having to pull it back. Quality on this stroller is top notch, no comparison when comparing this to my previous stroller. Makes it fun to jog with. Have used it for a few days and love it, little pricey but I think so far it blows away my previous stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont hesitate if youre looking for reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it.! Fits my infant and 2 yo. It also handled my 7yo and infant very well! No leaning or maneuvering to one side. I did not purchase a cupholder accessory for the handle bar. Instead i can comfortably place water bottles or my to go coffee in between the two rider shades, fits perfect!. Lots of storage down below. My boston terrier got tired on a long walk and was able to just chill in that storage compartment until we got home. It fit all my children/ baby essentials; picnic blanket; snacks; purse and still having room. I love it!!! We had a single bob years ago and loved it. the double is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Tobola

customer_reviews.title: Stable Stroller
customer_reviews.text: Papa bought two. One for grandsons home and one for our hope. Have old flagstone and cobblestone sidewalks. Roads horrible in NOLA. Unit never off balance. Large wheels rides over all terrain. Easy to go over curbs. Good cover for sun. Storage under set. Add on tray, &handle bar organizer very functional. Grandson loves the tray. We pick berries, wash them and place in tray for eating. The good life.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Goulet

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is awesome. It's easy to navigate even with one hand when someone needs to be held while you are pushing. It's not light weight or compact, but it's great for jogging or hiking and totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: MAshlyn

customer_reviews.title: It's our go-to stroller
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love this thing. It's our Go-To unless we're going shopping or something. It pushes real well, but it's obviously a little heavier than things like uppa baby. But the ride is so much better with the larger wheels and "suspension". And again, it's bulkier than others but the purpose is for an easier smoother ride.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Herrmann

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this double stroller to start training for a half marathon with my two kiddos 3.5 & 13 months. It's so good pushes like a dream & my kiddos have plenty of room in it!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney welch

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for two toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I finally purchased this stroller. I honestly wish I would have skipped the expensive tandem stroller I purchased first and went straight to the BOB dualie! The only complaint is that you have to buy snack tray and parent console separately but that’s usually what happens when you buy expensive strollers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed with this stroller! Very smooth ride, love the adjustable handle bars, and ease of use. Daughter loves it. We’ve had it for almost 6 months and use it daily. My only issue is that it came bent on the right side so I cannot fold it down. I didn’t realize this until a month or two after purchasing when I went to put it in the car the first time and it took us 30 min to figure out why it wouldn’t fold. So check all functionality when purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bob Gear Stroller
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grand daughter who is due any day with a baby girl. She was thrilled beyond words to receive this quality jogging stroller. I would highly recommend it !!
customer_reviews.author: R. Mazur

customer_reviews.title: Best double on the market.
customer_reviews.text: Best double stroller on the market. Boy, it's expensive, but it's worth it. Take a deep breath and just click add to cart! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: It is so worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is amazing. The Cadillac of strollers. I first bought a cheaper graco because it was compatible with my carseat but it was awful and I realized I couldn’t go cheap with a good double stroller. I purchased the graco converter part to go with it. My kids are 21 months apart and now we have our go to stroller for the next five years.
customer_reviews.author: Maura

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. A little hard to fold and carry. But the ride is smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Horton

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky after two uses
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this stroller about a week ago . After two uses it shakes and makes a squeaky noise . For the price I paid it’s unfortunate and sad I wasted my money .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best stroller out there
customer_reviews.text: If you love the outdoors and jogging, this is the best stroller! Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Suesserman

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Comfortable for our kids to ride. Comfortable for us to drive.
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: This was very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller, I bought this for my granddaughter and I am so excited to use it.
customer_reviews.author: CMP

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller
customer_reviews.text: Stroller is large enough for my 2 1/2 yr old and 1 yr old. Works great on dirt roads, mud etc.
customer_reviews.author: MMO

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller
customer_reviews.text: It's the Ferrari of all strollers! highly recommendable. My daughter just loves it for her first baby. Rose S.
customer_reviews.author: Rosebud

customer_reviews.title: Lack of infant adaptors for duallis
customer_reviews.text: Amazon is marketing in the "frequently bought together" a single infant adaptor that does not work with the duallie. Furthermore, they only have in stock the britax and Bob duallie infant adaptors...
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stroller
customer_reviews.text: Best stroller! Walking or running, this is the way to go. Easy to push with one hand even with turns. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: David P. Oneill

customer_reviews.title: Super swish jogging stroller.
customer_reviews.text: When my second daughter was born we discovered our neighborhood is a weird pocket with no sidewalks and bad roads, this makes a jogging stroller crucial as regular strollers cant handle the road and grass. The BOB stroller is easily the best one on the market. Not only is it easy to steer my child doesn't complain about pumps because she barely feels them! The only problem I had was the other day when it got super cold the front wheel actually froze making steering impossible. I ended up fixing it with WD 40. I would get this if you know you will be walking or jogging all the time as I can see it will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: louise

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This is lightweight and highly maneuverable. The build quality is excellent. I love that the visor has a pram-style cover that keeps out sun from literally any possible angle, without completely blacking out the child's view. Great storage capacity below. It is quite large, but you can't really get around that once you move into the double stroller with jogger function, so it is what it is. The front swivel wheel makes it highly maneuverable. I do wish it had tray water bottle, keys, cell phone, etc. One star down for that.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver DeMille, TJEd

customer_reviews.title: If I were a runner, this would be my stroller
customer_reviews.text: I've reviewed about 40-50 strollers for Amazon and this is among my top 3. What a beautifully engineered running stroller! Assemblage is a breeze, though you do have to adjust the tire pressure. It has magnificent wheels, big, sturdy and able to roll super smoothly. Very powerful foot brake, huge canopy with UPF 50+ that when pulled down protects your kid's full torso and part of the legs. Other nice features of this stroller are how easy and completely it folds in half, the adjustable handlebar to a wide range of heights, a safety wrist strap and an easy to use swivel knob, for walk or job mode (i.e., rotating or fixed front wheel).
customer_reviews.author: Mido

customer_reviews.title: Good, comfortable and strong stroller.
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is built nicely and seems to be very safe. The stroller is very spacious and comfortable for the children to sit in. With large wheels, it is easy to push and that is important especially for a dual stroller. The stroller has ample storage space under it. And there are a few other pickets as well. The stroller is easy to fold and unfold and is not very heavy for a dual stroller.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Great jogging stroller
customer_reviews.text: The BOB gear revolution flex is a fantastic jogging stroller. It has such a smooth push/turn. The air filled tired and suspension make it a smooth ride for my kids. It can hold up a child up to 75lbs which is amazing! The handle bar is adjustable which makes it nice for my husband and I to switch out who is pushing. The material is easy to clean. The basket is big and easily accessable. It folds easily too which is really nice. The canopy is huge! It covers so much of the seat. I definitely recommend this stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Erica K

customer_reviews.title: BOB is a must for young children
customer_reviews.text: BOB Gear Revolution Flex 3.0 Duallie Double Jogging Stroller, Graphite Black | Smooth Ride Suspension + Easy Fold + Adjustable Handlebar [New Logo] We have used BOB strollers with our kids for years. This latest version of the Duallie is definitely the best. This version is everything the previous version was but better. The storage under the stroller is huge. The suspension is really smooth especially when jogging. Bobs quality is outstanding and they also offer a great warranty. This stroller will last you a long time. Just remember to buy a bike lock, people love to steal this stroller as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: BOB is always superior
customer_reviews.text: BOB jogging strollers are always first rate. I have had many grandchildren and foster care children and always have various needs. I was concerned about this one working for a 2 year old and a 4 year old. The difference in their weights was about 10 pounds and it worked out superbly. I was kind of worried about the differential between younger children in Britax carseat -- which are incredibly protective-- and a 4 year old. I was worried if it would be more difficult to push because of the weight difference and pulling to one side or the other. About a 10 pound difference did not cause that problem. BOB is always superior.
customer_reviews.author: Trouble

customer_reviews.title: *Fantastic*
customer_reviews.text: These are the Caddilac's of strollers. They're built like tanks and yet they are maneuverable and easy to push. They are not, however, lightweight. They weigh in the range of 25lbs and you're going to need a large vehicle to transport them. However, this conveyance is a class act and I couldn't imagine raising children without them
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Goodchild

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to assemble and to use
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to put together! It's just a few basic steps, unlike some of the other brands that require much more work. Using the stroller is dead easy, too! From easy fold & open, to the super smooth ride. It's one of the best joggers on the market! The storage space is extra generous, and the comfort level for the kiddo is great, even for all-day use! Really happy with this stroller!
customer_reviews.author: Smartly Created

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stroller
customer_reviews.text: This is a really excellent double stroller! It was super easy to set up, and the ride is almost unbelievably smooth. The suspension system on this stroller is way nicer than anything I’ve used before. It is a little wider than I would have hoped, and it’s not the lightest stroller in the world... But the very lightweight one I was using before this seemed to achieve its lightness by means of being flimsy. This is built to last. The storage options are good, but what kind of stroller doesn't come with a cup holder?!
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: As good as it gets
customer_reviews.text: I've had the pleasure of reviewing a couple of joggers from different brands and this is easily the nicest one. It arrived in a large box and inside is the assembled product without wheels. Very simple just attach the three wheels and your off! It maneuvers really well for being such a wide stroller. The appearance is incredible it really looks high end. Very pleased with this jogger and I recommend it even if you don't jog due to its excellent maneuverability.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Wow...this thing is just awesome and so well made
customer_reviews.text: This is like the lear jet of strollers. Being able to put two grandkids in and go over bumps and humps in our jog is terrific. It's built like a brick sh*thouse and withstands almost anything. It's easy to maneuver and turns on a dime for such a big stroller. This is without a doubt the best jogging stroller on the market. Everything about it is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: imsocrazy

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE It!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and literally just glides! I absolutely love this, its easy to push one handed and has plenty of room. Its dark so it stays clean and the material is soft and comfy. Very VERY happy with this 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Chandi Crook

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stroller
customer_reviews.text: I have the 2.0 which I got in October of 2018. Can't say enough good things about this stroller - the price is definitely worth the quality. We've had this stroller with my twins through multiple cities as we've moved. It's handled constant wear and tear with little issue. The only problem we've faced in the time that we've had the stroller is a flat front tire due to a nail (which I replaced easily). Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Redmon

customer_reviews.title: Bulky, tires pop so much it's unusable
customer_reviews.text: Bulky, tires pop so much it's unusable. And that's with us only going on sidewalks. Save yourself the trouble. Don't buy a stroller with tube wheels. I should note it's not just my area. We ride bike around here all the time. No problems. It's just with this dumb stroller. Never again Bob never again.
customer_reviews.author: Mat W.

product_meta.title: BOB Gear Revolution Flex 3.0 Jogging Stroller | Ultra-Reflective Fabric + Smooth Ride Suspension + Easy Fold + Adjustable Handlebar, Lunar Black [New Logo]
product_meta.description: Color:Lunar Black| Style:SingleWith the BOB Revolution FLEX 3.0, you can say yes to any type of family outing-whether Prepping for a 10K or heading out for a day at the zoo. The suspension system keeps you running smoothly and the adjustable handlebar fits parents of all heights. The seat is designed with compression padding for all-day comfort and sits fully-upright so your little rider can take in the world. The extra-large UPF 50+ canopy shields from the sun and includes a magnetic "peek & chat" Window so you can check on and chat with your child along the way. With a spacious cargo basket and six storage pockets, you'll have plenty of room for all your gear and can keep your cell phone close-at-hand. The swivel-locking front wheel maneuvers easily through crowded streets and locks for stability when jogging while the reflective accents keep you safe on all your journeys (Lunar Black fashion is ultra-reflective).adventures are boundless with the BOB Revolution FLEX 3.0 jogging stroller.
feature_bullets: Smooth ride: Suspension system & air filled tires provide an ultra-smooth ride over any terrain
Perfect Fit: Adjustable handlebar creates the perfect Fit for parents of all heights; No-rethread harness design for easy height adjustments
Extra space: 6 storage pockets & extra-large cargo basket provide plenty of room for your gear; Includes a cell phone pocket at the handlebar
Kid comfort: Ultra-padded compression seat with infinite recline sits fully upright for all-day comfort, and lays near-flat with the push of a button
Travel system ready: Compatible with most major brand car seats with the use of a BOB infant car seat adapter (sold separately)

specifications.material_composition: Poly and Dobby Weave Fabrics With Reflective Print, Water Repellent Coating and Open Cell Foam Padding
specifications.Care instructions: Sponge area with a solution of lukewarm water and mild soap. Rinse thoroughly with clean water to remove all soap and allow to dry. Do not use detergent.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars258 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
